Class EditMetadataView

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View
musicApp.views.songs.EditMetadataView
public class EditMetadataView extends View
The EditMetadataView class is responsible for displaying the metadata editing interface for a song. It allows users to edit the title, artist, genre, and tags of a song, as well as choose a cover image.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    EditMetadataView.EditMetadataViewListener
    Listener interface for handling events in the EditMetadataView.

    • initAutoCompletion

      private void initAutoCompletion(javafx.scene.control.TextField input, javafx.scene.control.TextField autoCompletion, Function<String,Optional<String>> getSuggestedCompletion)
      Initializes the auto-completion functionality for a given text field.
      Parameters:
      input - The text field to which auto-completion is applied.
      autoCompletion - The text field that displays the suggested completion.
      getSuggestedCompletion - A function that provides the suggested completion based on the current input.

      public void populateFields(String title, String artist, String album, String genre, ArrayList<String> userTags)
      Populates the fields with the provided metadata.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the song.
      artist - The artist of the song.
      genre - The genre of the song.
      userTags - The user tags associated with the song.

    • promptUserForCoverFile

      private File promptUserForCoverFile()
      Prompts the user with a FileChooser dialog to select an image file.
      Returns:
      the selected File if the user chose one, or null otherwise

    • handleChooseCover

      private void handleChooseCover()
      Handles the user action of choosing a cover image. Opens a file chooser, and if a valid image is selected, loads and displays it in the view.
